metadata.title: USN-6048-1 -- ZenLib vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that ZenLib doesn't check the return value of a specific operation before using it. An attacker could use a specially crafted input to crash programs using the library.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6048-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libzen-dev - 0.4.29-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libzen-doc - 0.4.29-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libzen0 - 0.4.29-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
